column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. tawshīḥ man manhūk al-khufayf
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. iṣbahān. tawshīḥ hazajin li’abī mudīn al-ghawth
al-ṣan‘ah. iṣbahān. tawshīḥun li’abī mudīn al-ghawth

column3: hānī wal-lh kay turá al-surr al-‘ajīb

column2: qum wāightanam wawuṣalun ilá dhāk al-maqām
yā sdātī yā muwālī yā krām

column3: hānī wal-lh kay turá al-surr al-‘ajīb

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. tawshīḥ man mashṭūr al-raml

column2: mā sabānī fī al-milāḥ ilā al-rasūl
